item.title: Merger meltdown: Albertsons sues Kroger over $24.6 billion deal gone sour
item.description: The move came the day after two judges halted the merger in separate court cases.

item.title: How Rocket Companies’ first-ever CTO is deploying AI aimed at making home buying easier
item.description: He's focusing attention on technologies that can automate a lot of the processes of buying a home.

item.title: Elon Musk’s net worth tops $400 billion, a historic first
item.description: The most recent catalyst was an insider share sale of his privately held SpaceX, which boosted Musk’s net worth by roughly $50 billion in one fell swo...

item.title: Billionaire hedge fund exec and Mets owner Steve Cohen never wanted to stop working as a young trader: ‘I couldn’t wait for Mondays. I hated my weekends.’
item.description: The best traders are just like the best baseball players: "They can't wait to work, even in the offseason."

item.title: 5 great tech gift idea choices for this holiday season
item.description: Gadgets are one of the most popular gift categories.
